meanings.definition: Promoting the excretion of sodium in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The natriuretic medication helped the body get rid of extra salt through urine.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a natriuretic drug to help reduce the sodium levels in the patient's body.
meanings.sent3: The natriuretic effect of the herbal tea made the bathroom the most popular room in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a natriuretic cleanse, washing away the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The natriuretic properties of the plant were so strong that even the soil seemed lighter after watering.
